scripts.build:css: npx tailwindcss -i ./assets/css/main.css -o ./assets/css/style.css -m && node -e "const fs=require('fs');let css=fs.readFileSync('./assets/css/style.css','utf8');css=css.replace(/\/\*[\s\S]*?\*\//g,'').trim();fs.writeFileSync('./assets/css/style.css',css.trim());console.log('âœ“ Fully minified CSS (no comments, no empty lines)');"
